question: Need to buy a gift(Medical instrument so he can use it daily) for dad who is having dialysis(Kidney failure) due to type 2 diabetesDialysis is going good but He is having swelling and pain in his legs.So iam preferring to buy a foot massager to him .Is that fine ? or any suggestion please .Is there anyother thing I can buy for him .Need your help here.
title: Massager to reduce swelling and pain in legs and feet
